sentence: ( BCC ) will begin trading ex-dividend on May 31, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.07 per share is scheduled to be paid on June 15, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased BCC prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 3rd quarter that BCC has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $47.7, the dividend yield is .59%.
The previous trading day's last sale of BCC was $47.7, representing a -0.42% decrease from the 52 week high of $47.90 and a 81.71% increase over the 52 week low of $26.25.
BCC is a part of the Consumer Services sector, which includes companies such as Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) and Lowe's Companies, Inc. ( LOW ).
BCC's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $2.81.
Zacks Investment Research reports BCC's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as 74.69%, compared to an industry average of 22.1%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the BCC Dividend History page.
